sentences.sContent: Andy reeled away from the bar and knocked over his stool.
sentences.sCn: 安迪踉跄着离开吧台，把凳子都撞倒了。

phrases.pCn: 流畅地讲；抽出；一口气说
不停地，立即；滔滔不绝地

remMethod.val: 喝醉酒步履蹒跚(reel)， 感觉(feel)墙走我不走

trans.tranCn: 摇摇晃晃地移动，蹒跚；眩晕，发昏
trans.tranOther: to walk in an unsteady way and almost fall over, as if you are drunk
a round object onto which film, wire, a special string for fishing etc can be wound
to wind (cotton, thread, etc) onto a reel
